description: The engineer and creator of Sandrock and Quatre`s mentor. He is rather fat, with a receding hairline and a thin, dark mustache that stands straight out at each end. A worker at MO-III, he originally met Quatre when the young heir`s shuttle was hijacked by the Maganac Corps. After learning of the youth`s strength and resolve, he ended up taking a job as Quatre`s tutor while borrowing Winner family resources to build Sandrock.
name: H Kyouju
